channel.title: shortlink generator on
channel.description: Recent content in shortlink generator on

item.title: Best 4 short url generators comparison
item.description: Small link, short link, short url… All these names design a short string of charaters that makes it easy to access long links. These links are not only a fancy way to send a link. Actually, it can offers many information as the number of clicks, the location of the users, the website where the user clicked… Therefore, many platform were developed and offers multiple features each. Even the big companies like Linkedin has it’s own shortlink for all the links posted on their website.
